document.full_text: mr. chandnois was a special-teams star with the pittsburgh steelers whose average on kickoff returns was second only to that of gale sayers in n.f.l. history.
document.title: lynn chandnois, 86, ex-steeler, is dead
lines_and_colors: mr. chandnois was a special-teams star with the pittsburgh steelers whose average on kickoff returns was second only to that of gale sayers in n.f.l. history.
